website_summaries.verdict: The combination of quick read and write performance, useful utilities, easy setup, and a fair price makes the tiny Maxtor OneTouch III Mini Edition drive a winner.
pros: The Maxtor OneTouch III Mini Edition offers a large capacity (60GB or 100GB), intuitive and useful utilities, and speedy performance
cons: The Maxtor OneTouch III Mini Edition is a little bigger than some of the portable drives we've seen, and we'd also like to see a padded carrying case for it

customer_reviews.title: Maxtor Mini - Almost fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I didn't realize how SMALL it was until I opened it. The GREAT thing about it is that it's powered by the usb cable and is only twice the size of a pack of cigarettes so you can backup, unplug and bring to another computer or bring to your vehicle so you have "offsite" backup. The ONLY thing I'd improve is the software. It nicely syncs but isn't very configurable, and you can't leave it unattended, you have to "yes or no" some overwrites. BUT I just use my OLD maxtor one touch software or my "vice versa" and it works great. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Ken LaVoie

customer_reviews.title: files a go go
customer_reviews.text: Excellent little travel drive (little in size, lots of storage). It comes formatted as a SAT drive, which I was going to change to NTFS but decided against it because as a SAT it can be used with multiple operating systems. No separate power required, which makes this an ideal USB plugin device. The one annoying thing is a huge white eye that could be used as a flashlight. A tiny green or blue light would have done just as well, but less obtrusively.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph M. Vles

customer_reviews.title: Easy Use, Fast transfers ...
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this as a back up drive for over a year now .. I love it. Maxtor One Touch is an amazing brand .. they have since come out with newer versions of this same drive which I would imagine to be just as easy to use, efficient, and so helpful. The file transfers are easy drag and drop or other options which transfer files automatically. The only thing I would like to see is a sleeker, slimmer design.
customer_reviews.author: Buckaroo Lou

customer_reviews.title: Maxtor 160 2.5" HardDrive review
customer_reviews.text: I live in Jamaica and was sceptical about buying a computer accessory over the internet cause it might get damaged. However i went ahead and bout the Maxtor one touch 3 hard drive from amazon. It is an excellent buy. I would reccommend it to every one. I have had it for about 3 weeks now and it works flawlessly. I have been a customer of amazon from the day they opened in 1996, but it is mostly books and cd's. I will be definately buying more electronics through them.
customer_reviews.author: Connan Spence

customer_reviews.title: MAXOR VENDOR
customer_reviews.text: PRODUCT WAS INCOMPATIBLE WITH APPLE-ASK VENDOR TO TAKE IT BACK -ACCEPTED IMMDEDIATELY WITHOUT HASSLE AND REFUNDED MY ACCOUNT QUICKLY WILL BUY AGAIN FROM NY-TONER 100 GRADING M.SCHWARTZ
customer_reviews.author: MONIQUE SCHWARTZ

customer_reviews.title: Amazon drops the ball on a complaint about dead drive
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this drive and it was dead upon arrival. It would not be recognized by either a MAC or a PC, and no disc was included in the shipment. I was unable to contact the seller, who had no known phone number associated with the return address on the shipping label. I have written to AMAZON twice, without any response. Very disappointing customer service and seller realtions, Jerry Reed Giclée Maker [...]
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Reed

customer_reviews.title: My computer has never been slower
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what it is about the included software, but this really slows my system. Further, I always get a message that the backup failed. That is not very encouraging. However, when I check the drive, my files are there. The instructions with the software are not very good. Overall, I give it a "fair." It is relatively cheap and compact but fails to give me the "peace of mind" that I was hoping for when I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Big Daddy

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable
customer_reviews.text: This hard drive is small and compact, but quite unreliable. I have tried reformatting this drive and still it grabs onto other programs and freezes them. The programs resume when I disconnect the usb port. It was a bargain, but there is a reason. I really don't recommend this. Why is it that people generally rate a postive review as helpful and a negative review is not? Nevertheless look for a solid brand.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. D

customer_reviews.title: Portable Defined
customer_reviews.text: If a portable hard drive is what you need, then a portable hard drive is what you will find with this. It comes with driver that lets you to sync your directory with push of the button on it, which makes my role of "protector of the digital photos of the house" very easy. However, I cannot give it 5 star because somehow my IBM thinkpad does not think it is there and it is driving me nuts. I can only do everything through the DELL.
customer_reviews.author: S. Duan

customer_reviews.title: Dead after 25 days
customer_reviews.text: Bought it on the 11th, and it's dead on the 26th. It was fine up until then - speedy, convenient, small, attractive, lightweight, and ran nicely with my Dell laptop. But a dead hard drive is less than worthless, it's a true pain. Now I have to recover everything from backups. Blah.
customer_reviews.author: Lorenzo Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not very intuitive. Impossible to know if it has backed up anything. Get another device instead.
customer_reviews.author: GP

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this about a month ago and so far it has worked great. The additional power connection (on the cable included in the package) to a second USB slot was necessary on my laptop (Dell Inspiron) but is not needed in any of my other desktop computers. Comes with software on the HD that can be installed for additional features like password protection, one-touch backups etc. I filled 80% of the drive and still I see no speed issues. Thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: Darwin

customer_reviews.title: Worst Portable Hard Drive Ever
customer_reviews.text: This is my fifth portable (2.5") hard drive and by far the worst one. I bought this hard drive 2 months ago at BestBuy and compared to others (one WD Passport, three home-made with 2.5" internal drive and $10 enclosures), this one is EXTREMELY SLOW. Worst even, when you're using it every other program would be much slower; the CPU usage meter would not show why 'cause it's still at 2-3% usage. My computer is a reasonably fast system (Core 2 Duo E6300 with 2G memory for my desktop, T2300 with 1G memory for my laptop) but still suffers. No other portable hard drive, even the cheap home-made ones, have these problems.
customer_reviews.author: Hengchang Pan

customer_reviews.title: Awful Product
customer_reviews.text: Do not waste your money buying this driver, I Lost all my backup data... The hard drive always was treated very carefully. Six years of work wasted, THANK YOU Maxtor...
customer_reviews.author: Pedro Yaselli

customer_reviews.title: Maxtor One Touch Mini
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a small portable hard drive that would store all of my important information from the computer as a back up. The Maxtor One Touch Mini is very small, about the size of a ladies wallet, and very simple to use. I am happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh M. Couch

customer_reviews.title: good quality and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: drive is very easy to install and has good performance. just plug it in, install the software if you want to setup automatic backups etc and your ready. good build quality too.
customer_reviews.author: Bart Verbaandert

product_meta.title: Maxtor OneTouch III Mini Edition 160GB USB 2.0 Portable Hard Drive
product_meta.description:
The Maxtor OneTouch III Mini Edition is a portable, feature-rich, easy to use backup and storage hard drive that fits in the palm of your hand. Backup your entire computer whether for business documents, artwork, files for school or personal memories and Maxtor makes it simple to back up all or select files on your computer with the touch of a button. The Maxtor OneTouch III Mini Edition plugs into any computer via a USB 2.0 port for data transfer and power, no power cable needed. Synchronize data between two or more computers on the same operating system. Maxtor DriveLock and Encryption for Windows only safeguard against unauthorized users. System Rollback feature can roll back your Windows system to a point in time before a virus attack while keeping your data current. System Requirements - Pentium III, 500 MHz processor or higher, Windows 2000 Professional, XP Professional or Home Edition, Mac OS X 10.2.8 or later, 128MB RAM (256MB recommended) and Internet Connection for system updates Dimensions - Length 5.24 x Height 3.54 x Depth 0.79 inch Weight - 7.2 ounces (205 grams)

AMAZON.COM
The Maxtor® OneTouch® III Mini storage solution is a full-featured, portable backup and storage solution with Maxtor SafetyDrill™ for complete recovery of a hard drive’s contents in case of a system crash or virus/spyware attack*. With two levels of data security and capacities up to 160 GB, users can automatically back up or sync work and home computers and confidently carry an up-to-date portfolio in their pockets. 

 



Work and play on the go. This lightweight, portable drive lets you bring important files with you. 

Back up your files with one touch of a button Portable storage with software for simple backup, sync and security
Are you on the run? Do you travel frequently, need to transfer files between two or more computers, or are constantly trying to remember which versions of your documents are the most current? Then the Maxtor OneTouch III Mini Edition is the solution for you.  Your digital data—whether it’s business documents, artwork, files for school, or personal memories—is precious to you and critical for you to maintain. The most effective way to safeguard your files is to back up your computer. And Maxtor makes it simple to back up all your files or selected files on your PC’s drive, automatically or with one touch of a button. Weighing less than 8 ounces, the Maxtor OneTouch III Mini Edition is the perfect solution for anyone who needs an easy, secure way to carry their up-to-date digital portfolio.

 Part of the OneTouch III family and featuring their award-winning user experience, with the Maxtor OneTouch III Mini Edition you get backup, storage, security, and travel capabilities all in one—the most complete portable solution on the market today. Designed for mobility the Mini Edition can be carried in your pocket, briefcase, or backpack while holding up to 160GB of your data. It is the perfect solution for traveling business and creative professionals, students, anyone who is on the go.

 The only all in one package—backup, store, protect, travel!
The Maxtor OneTouch III Mini Edition also gives you one of the most feature-rich portables available. The Mini Edition plugs into your personal computer via a USB 2.0 port for both data transfer and power, no additional power cords are needed. It also lets you effortlessly synchronize data between two or more computers on the same operating system, so that your most up-to-date files are secure and always at hand. And the Mini Edition comes with two levels of security, Maxtor DriveLock and Encryption to safeguard against unauthorized use. 

 The System Rollback feature can roll back your system to a point in time, such as before a virus attack, while keeping your data current. 

 The sleek and slim design of this hard drive--only measures 5.24 x 0.79 x 3.54-inches (H x D x W). The Maxtor OneTouch III Mini lets you transfer files seamlessly from your computer via its USB 2.0 connection at a brisk transfer rate of up to 480Mb/sec. The drive delivers a spindle speed of 5,400 RPM, giving you the high-speed performance you need to back your data up quickly and safely.

 Product Highlights


· Ideal backup and storage for carrying your digital portfolio with you · Maxtor® SafetyDrill™ prepares, boots, recovers your PC’s entire internal drive contents in case of system failure or virus/spyware infection · Sync data between two or more computers on the same operating system · Maxtor DrivePass™ and Encryption: two levels of security against unauthorized use · Simple Maxtor user interface for drive management, security and backup scheduling · USB 2.0 for fast data interface and power source · 1-year warranty · Customizable Maxtor OneTouch® button · Drive- and power-management utilities included · Quick and easy installation with pre-loaded software · Auto Updater helps keep your Maxtor OneTouch solution current · PC and Mac compatible · 5400 RPM, up to 8-MB cache buffer 
Maxtor® is the expert and the leader in designing simple external storage and backup solutions for consumers and professionals. Maxtor offers a broad line of trusted, intuitive storage solutions for safeguarding critical business data, digital files and personal memories. Maxtor developed the industry’s first external storage device that features easy-to-use OneTouch® button backup and restore capabilities. The Maxtor OneTouch III Mini solution is the easy way to back up and store photos, videos, games, music, business data, personal information and more. The OneTouch III Mini solution continues the OneTouch legacy as the leading external hard drive for small office users, consumers, creative professionals and mobile warriors.  Windows Only*


What's in the Box
External hard drive, USB cable, Quick start guide, Software and user guide preloaded on drive
feature_bullets: Maxtor OneTouch button - the easy way to make backup copies of your files
Ideal backup and storage for carrying your digital portfolio with you
Two levels of security with Maxtor DriveLock and Encryption to safeguard against unauthorized use
Simple Maxtor user-interface for drive management, security and automated backup scheduling
System Rollback - rolls back your PC settings to a better point in time while keeping data current

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.0 out of 5 stars20 ratings3.0 out of 5 stars
